articles.description: The singer, 41, wrapped up in a black coat and added inches with matching heels as she chatted to the drum and bass producer on a busy Soho street.
articles.content:
Paloma Faith was all smiles as she enjoyed a stroll with her musician pal Pete Jolliffe in London on Thursday.
